headline: Evergy's Infrastructure Investments & Renewable Push Drive Growth
summary: EVRG's is ramping up transmission investments, renewable projects, and infrastructure upgrades to drive growth while targeting carbon neutrality by 2045.

raw.headline: Evergy's Infrastructure Investments & Renewable Push Drive Growth
raw.summary: EVRG's is ramping up transmission investments, renewable projects, and infrastructure upgrades to drive growth while targeting carbon neutrality by 2045.

headline: FirstEnergy’s Pennsylvania Default Service Program DSP-VI Auction: Part 1 Applications Due from Prospective Bidders by Thursday, October 9, 2025
summary: BOSTON, September 30, 2025--CRA International, Inc. (NASDAQ: CRAI), a worldwide leader in providing economic, financial, and management consulting services, is opening the application process for the FirstEnergy Pennsylvania Electric Company (FE PA) auction to procure full requirements Default Supply generation service for their Default Service Customers. The application process will lead up to the auction scheduled for November 12, 2025.
